hints.content:
$\begin{align}
\blue{2+3}&\blue{=1+5}\\
\blue{5}&\blue{=6}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $5$ is not the same as $6$.

$\begin{align}
\pink{3+3}&\pink{= 3-3}\\
\pink{6}&\pink{= 0}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $6$ is not the same as $0$.

$\begin{align}
\purple{10+1}&\purple{=1+10}\\
\purple{11}&\purple{=11}\\
\end{align}$  
This is true because $11$ is the same as $11$.
